turn.4: According to Hindu scriptures, the term Ambastha refers to the community who prays to the eight forms of amba or commonly called GODDESS DURGA Ambastha refers to a sub-caste of Kayasthas, and Crooke suggests that "they may be connected with the old Ambastha caste" as some Kayasthas are also associated with the practice of medicine and surgery.

turn.6: Ridgeon mentions about the myth related to the origin of the four varnas in the Rigveda, and says that in order to explain "the great number of castes, a theory was developed that unions between men and women of different varnas produced offspring of various castes".
